quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
name: Confucius

quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
name: Matsuo Basho

quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
name: George A. Moore

quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
name: Rosalia de Castro

quote: The best education I have ever received was through travel.
name: Lisa Ling

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
name: Frank Borman

quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
name: Buddha

quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
name: Danny Kaye

quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy.
name: Rene Redzepi

quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
name: Martin Buber

quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice.
name: Linda McCartney

quote: Many a trip continues long after movement in time and space have ceased.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: The beauty of reading is that it lets you travel in a way you could never know.
name: Alek Wek

quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.
name: Damon Albarn

quote: I travel continuously, and I see many cities, but there is nowhere like London.
name: Norman Foster

quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.
name: John Muir

quote: Paris is always a good idea.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: You know more of a road by having traveled it than by all the conjectures and descriptions in the world.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning.
name: Giotto di Bondone

quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The travel and tourism industry, it's just a huge part of our economy.
name: Karen Hughes

quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.
name: Truman Capote

quote: Even if it turns out that time travel is impossible, it is important that we understand why it is impossible.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I see travelling as a great learning process, and my biggest dream is to travel the world.
name: Pooja Hegde

quote: I travel, I read, I write, I have other lives. But when I have a camera, I know that's my country, my island.
name: Leos Carax

quote: Just got back from a pleasure trip: I took my mother-in-law to the airport.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
name: Al Gore

quote: But you can travel on for ten thousand miles, and still stay where you are.
name: Harry Chapin

quote: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Writing and travel broaden your ass if not your mind and I like to write standing up.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: There are few places you can find silence. Air travel could be the last fortress of solitude.
name: Regina Brett

quote: I always pack a travel snack bag. You don't want to get stuck without snacks no matter where you go!
name: Busy Philipps

quote: Besides, I'm a gypsy at heart and I like to travel around.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: The one thing I regret was that my work required an enormous amount of my time, and a lot of travel.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.
name: Werner Herzog

quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.
name: Mohsin Hamid

quote: Ah! Young people, travel if you can, and if you cannot - travel all the same!
name: Jules Verne

quote: Rail travel for me is the most relaxing, most scenic way to see the country.
name: John Paul DeJoria

quote: Every perfect traveler always creates the country where he travels.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: It's been a huge blessing, being able to travel and have a great life.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: You get educated by traveling.
name: Solange Knowles

quote: My goal is to ensure the Northern Border is safe, secure and allows for the free flow of travel and commerce.
name: Rick Larsen

quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.
name: Anais Nin

quote: I am learning that in life it is OK to travel in darkness, not knowing what your next move is.
name: Cobie Smulders

quote: The traveller has reached the end of the journey!
name: Edmund Burke

quote: It's funny. You travel all over the world, and you wind up with a guy from your hometown.
name: Patty Smyth

quote: A zero-gravity flight is a first step toward space travel.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I wanted to travel from the beginning. As a kid, I used to dream about airplanes, before I ever flew in one.
name: Mary Ellen Mark

quote: It's cool to meet your idols. It's a good opportunity to travel. Those kinds of things are good.
name: Meg White

quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.
name: William Blake

quote: You develop a sympathy for all human beings when you travel a lot.
name: Shakuntala Devi

quote: No matter how you travel, it's still you going.
name: Jeff Goldblum

quote: Young people should travel, and they don't. You can't know if you don't go.
name: Quincy Jones

quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really.
name: Dhani Jones

quote: Technology doesn't address everything - for example, air travel still sucks.
name: Brad Feld

quote: Trust is the conduit for influence; it's the medium through which ideas travel.
name: Amy Cuddy

quote: I don't travel without a sleep mask or Post Its!
name: Georgina Bloomberg

quote: Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones.
name: Sophie Swetchine

quote: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere.
name: Xun Kuang

quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
name: William Shakespeare

quote: If all difficulties were known at the outset of a long journey, most of us would never start out at all.
name: Dan Rather

quote: I love to see new things, and I love to learn. I always learn so much when I travel - that's the best thing.
name: Larry Fitzgerald

quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: What does it mean to pre-board? Do you get on before you get on?
name: George Carlin

quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I'll bring my grits when I travel, because I get so hungry on the road.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself.
name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: London is a roost for every bird.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
name: Susan Sontag

quote: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Time travel is such a magic concept.
name: Matt Smith

quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.
name: Terry Brooks

quote: Time travel is a wonderful thing, isn't it?
name: Bradley Walsh

quote: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: I get very homesick, but otherwise it's a great privilege to get to travel for work.
name: Jesse Eisenberg

quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: In Italy, they add work and life on to food and wine.
name: Robin Leach

quote: I just travel the world with my backpack and my cameras and a bunch of Clif bars.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Space travel for everyone is the next frontier in the human experience.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Travel like a pro, not like a hobo. That's my motto.
name: Greg Gutfeld

quote: Travel teaches toleration.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I really have to dance more often, and so I travel around. If I don't, I will crumble.
name: Rudolf Nureyev

quote: The most useful form of time travel would be to go back a year or two and rectify the mistakes we made.
name: Matt Lucas

quote: An unexpected benefit of my career in biochemistry has been travel.
name: Paul D. Boyer

quote: The Bad Seeds are a band I will travel a great distance to see whenever possible.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: I'm a travel enthusiast.
name: Iggy Pop

quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: The bottom line is that time travel is allowed by the laws of physics.
name: Brian Greene

quote: I take a cooking class everywhere I travel. I find it's the best way to get to know a culture.
name: Blake Lively

quote: I love to photograph the gorgeous landscapes when I travel.
name: Blake Lively

quote: Because it's cheaper and easier to fly than ever before, air travel is becoming democratized.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: I travel like a maniac. I travel more than anyone I know. I love learning the languages.
name: Quincy Jones

quote: I love to travel, I love to go out with my friends, but what I love most is being home with my family.
name: Deborah Raney

quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy.
name: Frances Burney

quote: I think young people should travel and travel often to other countries... like I do.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.
name: Gene Simmons

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Being in a band is like a small family. You travel together, make music, and share time with each other.
name: Mohit Chauhan

quote: We all become great explorers during our first few days in a new city, or a new love affair.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I might have been born in a hovel but I am determined to travel with the wind and the stars.
name: Jacqueline Cochran

quote: I never travel without my sketch book.
name: Ian Wright

quote: I want to teach. I want to speak. I want to travel.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: I get a friend to travel with me... I need somebody to bring me back to who I am. It's hard to be alone.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.
name: George Eliot

quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: I do my best work alone. I travel alone a lot.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: I have gotten to travel the world and experience all these incredible things thanks to my career.
name: Karlie Kloss

quote: Good-quality travel and good-quality food are the two luxuries that I never have any guilt indulging in.
name: Charlie Hunnam

quote: The travel writer seeks the world we have lost - the lost valleys of the imagination.
name: Alexander Cockburn

quote: If your work requires you to travel, you will understand that there's no vacation destination like home.
name: Park Chan-wook

quote: To travel America and see everything it has to offer, with my best friend, sounds like the perfect road trip.
name: Holly Marie Combs

quote: Connecting with people, getting things done - that's what makes the travel worthwhile.
name: Tim Finchem

quote: The world I travel is my inspiration. I name my dresses after cities that inspire me.
name: Naeem Khan

quote: I'm a bad traveller because I suffer from travel sickness.
name: Miranda Raison

quote: To bring up a child in the way he should go, travel that way yourself once in a while.
name: Josh Billings

quote: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: I take my Bible with me, sometimes two of them, when I travel.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: Christmas to a child is the first terrible proof that to travel hopefully is better than to arrive.
name: Stephen Fry

quote: One of the sad truths about leadership is that, the higher up the ladder you travel, the less you know.
name: Margaret Heffernan

quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home.
name: David Attenborough

quote: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel.
name: David Attenborough

quote: Travel is a lot like love.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: My ideal travel companions are my family.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: We travel often to Asia, Africa, Europe, where they were born.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: I want to travel overseas and help out people all over the world.
name: Chance The Rapper

quote: In America there are two classes of travel - first class, and with children.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: Physical books are still my favorite, but I own an e-book reader. They're convenient for travel.
name: Jesmyn Ward

quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.
name: Aristophanes

quote: It's wonderful to learn about new cultures and to be able to travel easily to so many countries.
name: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: Travel is the best and probably cheapest graduate school you can buy.
name: Tom Freston

quote: It's kind of amazing that people will travel because of a book. I admire that.
name: Frances Mayes

quote: I don't like to travel. Yet all my books seem to involve a journey.
name: Chris Van Allsburg

quote: Travel aesthetics should be just as comfortable and practical as they are fashionable.
name: Miguel

quote: It is not fit that every man should travel; it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: We travel so much, I never adjust to time zones any more.
name: Jillian Hervey

quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education.
name: David Rockefeller

quote: Nothing in the universe can travel at the speed of light, they say, forgetful of the shadow's speed.
name: Howard Nemerov

quote: Fuel prices are at the center of our lives. They affect our ability to travel, stay warm, and feed ourselves.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: I have to travel a lot, but relaxation to me is when I am at home.
name: Mikhail Khodorkovsky

quote: Just to travel is rather boring, but to travel with a purpose is educational and exciting.
name: Sargent Shriver

quote: I'm not proud of it, but I'm a great liar when I travel. I smile and lie, and things are smooth.
name: Paolo Bacigalupi

quote: We're constantly buying airplane tickets; we travel on the Concorde.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: My wife and I love to travel, so if we don't have work on either her or my birthday, we definitely travel.
name: Barun Sobti

quote: The trading side of the business means a lot of travel, being out of the office a lot of time.
name: Ivan Glasenberg

quote: For me, travel happens when I see an interesting opportunity happening.
name: Timothy C. Draper

quote: The world has become more complex as technology and easy travel mixes cultures without homogenizing them.
name: Norman Spinrad

quote: Almost 70 percent of U.S. ag exports travel the upper Mississippi River and the Illinois waterway system.
name: Jerry Costello

quote: I travel a lot, and I hunt for fabrics, then I have the tailor make me something.
name: Waris Ahluwalia

quote: The time to enjoy a European trip is about three weeks after unpacking.
name: George Ade

quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: The best way to travel abroad is to live with the locals.
name: Zach Braff

quote: The only thing I like about air travel is it gives me time to read.
name: Jane Lindskold

quote: Chicago is an October sort of city even in spring.
name: Nelson Algren

quote: We must travel in the direction of our fear.
name: John Berryman

quote: I love to travel but hate traffic and planes. I wish I could just beam myself anywhere instantly.
name: Jordan Ladd

quote: Of all possible subjects, travel is the most difficult for an artist, as it is the easiest for a journalist.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: I do have to travel a lot for speaking engagements.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Travel works best when you're forced to come to terms with the place you're in.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: The amount of hassle involved in travel can be overwhelming.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: The job of the travel writer is to go far and wide, to make voluminous notes, to tell the truth.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: Science fiction is filled with Martians and space travel to other planets, and things like that.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: I travel in so many different ways; I travel high, I rough it... it all depends on who I travel with.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: By the time I'm 40, interplanetary travel will be common. Nobody will want to talk to me at that age, anyway.
name: Ace Frehley

quote: I travel for work, but recently, friends said I should take major trips.
name: Jeff Goldblum

quote: I run five miles three times a week; I log everything. I look up routes when I travel.
name: Kevin Plank

quote: Touring can be tough; the crew and I travel everywhere by a big pink bus, and live in petrol stations.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: I travel a lot. I'm on the move.
name: Ted Turner

quote: I fly economy. I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.
name: Gene Simmons

quote: There are few aspects of everyday life that aren't touched by the technologies developed for space travel.
name: Scott Kelly

quote: One of the places I'd like to travel to is Ibiza, off the coast of Spain.
name: Rob Gronkowski

quote: I travel all over the country making speeches for people I believe in.
name: Ann Richards

quote: I want to see friends more and travel more.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: My mom loved fashion. We loved to travel and go to Italy and Paris.
name: Melania Trump

quote: I always want off-the-beaten-path, Anthony Bourdain-inspired travel.
name: Meghan Markle

quote: I love Ralph Lauren. As I travel so much, I prefer to shop online.
name: Meghan Markle

quote: When I haven't been working I've tried to travel a lot.
name: Emma Watson

quote: My fans are honestly so unique and so similar. Wherever I travel, they are so, so different but so the same.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: I would love to be a travel writer. I'd be so stoked.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: I do think that travel can be part of a journey of inner maturation, but you've got to do it right.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: I love to travel, anywhere in the world. Wherever it is... India... Tibet... wherever. I'll go anywhere.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel.
name: Renee Fleming

quote: Having to travel so much plays havoc with your personal life.
name: Renee Fleming

quote: I only travel with a carry-on suitcase in most instances.
name: Brad Goreski

quote: I am very lucky to have the opportunity to travel to so many amazing destinations for work!
name: Brad Goreski

quote: An English man does not travel to see English men.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there.
name: Fred Allen

quote: When I go on Japanese Airlines, I really love it because I like Japanese food.
name: Phil Collins

quote: I travel a lot and rarely make it home to Seattle.
name: Hope Solo

quote: I've missed the association with players and coaches but haven't missed the recruiting and the travel.
name: Ara Parseghian

quote: People travel north from Barcelona, not south.
name: Jose Andres

quote: The Queen Mary was the most civilized and luxurious way one could travel to America in the late 1930s.
name: Maureen O'Hara

quote: I just can't do heels any more. At least not when I'm working. I travel a lot.
name: Victoria Beckham

quote: I travel every single day, but I make it a point to hit the gym. I want to look good for the summer.
name: Pauly D

quote: I love to travel. This is the time for me. When will I do it if not now?
name: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: I'm sure we'll be Tweetin' up the Twitosphere as we travel around the world playing music.
name: Brandon Boyd

quote: I generally travel with my laptop, a couple of great books, and my iPod.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: When you travel on a bus with guys who love all kinds of music, you get exposed to some great stuff, man.
name: Gregg Allman

quote: I hate to travel. I don't go anywhere.
name: Ingmar Bergman

quote: I think that you certainly don't have to be aged and travel the world to write a poem.
name: Rita Dove

quote: Anytime you introduce volatility, it is not good for business and not good for travel.
name: Dara Khosrowshahi

quote: While Expedia is outbound-focused, Wotif is much more about domestic travel.
name: Dara Khosrowshahi

quote: I clean my own utensils, my house and I even travel alone. I don't know what the life of a superstar is like.
name: Esha Gupta

quote: You know it's only 50 miles from Grand River to Canton, but it took me 67 years to travel that distance.
name: Don Shula

quote: I travel a lot, so I know that it's important to have people in your life to keep you ground.
name: Marley Dias

quote: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes.
name: Robin Leach

quote: I do get to meet a lot of people, and I do get to travel quite a bit. You may laugh, but it's a tough job.
name: Robin Leach

quote: I love short trips to New York; to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.
name: James Cameron

quote: I have amazing memories of being able to travel and being able to have family all over the world.
name: Lily Collins

quote: I love getting oxygen facials because I travel a lot. My skin gets pretty dry with all the airplanes.
name: Lily Collins

quote: I was born to travel and write verse.
name: Theophile Gautier

quote: There's going to be space travel at some point.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: When I was starting out, it was almost impossible for me to get visas to travel to tournaments.
name: Ana Ivanovic

quote: I'm lucky my parents travel with me.
name: Paula Creamer

quote: My bucket list tends to relate to travel or eating.
name: Elijah Wood

quote: Travel, of course, narrows the mind.
name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: The trouble with travelling back later on is that you can never repeat the same experience.
name: Michael Palin

quote: I just don't see myself as a travel writer. I can't. I don't.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: I want to travel. Maybe I'll end up living in Norway, making cakes.
name: Eva Green

quote: My phone is my favorite travel gadget because it has my translator.
name: Andrew Zimmern

quote: I don't like Miami that much. I don't like the weather. My base is Miami, but I travel a lot.
name: Juan Pablo Galavis

quote: The joke we always say is that WWE doesn't pay us to wrestle, they pay us to travel.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: Most of my workouts happen by myself because I travel so much.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: There are other writers who try for subtle and minimalists effects, but I don't travel in that tribe.
name: Pat Conroy

quote: My father's plan was, we were going to grow up and travel the world.
name: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.

quote: I travel all the time.
name: Guy Kawasaki

quote: You cannot travel within and stand still without.
name: James Lane Allen

quote: I was young. I was newly married. And I had worked like a dog. I just wanted to live and travel.
name: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: Most people travel outside of Australia. They don't realise what we've got.
name: Nick Cummins

quote: Travel teaches as much as books.
name: Youssou N'Dour

quote: You can tell all our songs come from us and from our artists, the people we write with and travel with.
name: Zac Brown

quote: No matter where I've been overseas, the food stinks, except in Italy.
name: Carmen Electra

quote: The only really expensive thing in our family budget, frankly, is private air travel.
name: Nick Hanauer

quote: I travel a lot, but I don't come away with new inspiration.
name: Edward Ruscha

quote: I hate to travel with stuff.
name: Manolo Blahnik

quote: I've always wanted to do a travel show for people who never thought they could.
name: Zach Anner

quote: Spontaneity is what travel is all about.
name: Zach Anner

quote: When I travel, I like to take advantage of room service. I'm really into eggs Benedict in the morning.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: I'm going to do more movies and travel.
name: Tommy Wiseau

quote: Travel is a passion. I intend seeing the world.
name: Anushka Shetty

quote: Travel definitely affects me as a writer.
name: Anthony Doerr

quote: Traveling is seeing; it is the implicit that we travel by.
name: Cynthia Ozick

quote: I'm pretty low-key. I travel fairly light, especially on the tour.
name: Christine McVie

quote: Certain travellers give the impression that they keep moving because only then do they feel fully alive.
name: Ella Maillart

quote: My wife and I have so much fun when we travel and find anything... like stray cats and squirrels.
name: Eric Roberts

quote: If you travel first class, you think first class and you are more likely to play first class.
name: Raymond Floyd

quote: News seems to travel far more quickly on Twitter and Facebook than through search.
name: Marvin Ammori

quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
name: Felix Baumgartner

quote: I don't like to leave anything unfinished on my desk before I travel.
name: Vijay Mallya

quote: Travel books are, by and large, boring. They lodge uncomfortably between fact, fiction and autobiography.
name: Arthur Smith

quote: New York is the great stone desert.
name: Israel Zangwill

quote: On long haul flights I always drink loads and loads of water and eat light and healthy food.
name: Lisa Snowdon

quote: Travel is hard, but entertaining is joy.
name: Debbie Reynolds

quote: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags.
name: Guy Clark

quote: Yes, I travel in unusual circles. George Osborne and his wife Frances are my cousins.
name: Daryl Hall

quote: I got to travel a lot and meet amazing people. That was a lot of fun.
name: Bhavish Aggarwal

quote: I want my life to match my work now. I don't want to work and then travel. I want to be at one place.
name: Sarita Choudhury

quote: I have the feeling that all stories travel with an understory.
name: Ali Smith

quote: I love being a troubadour. I travel around the world with my wife and play little theaters. We have a ball.
name: Roger McGuinn

quote: The hardest part is to travel, and to be away from your family.
name: Glenn Tipton

quote: You need to be an adrenalin junkie when you travel with kids.
name: Graeme Le Saux

quote: A good story can travel in time and borders; it hits you no matter where you are.
name: Hakan Nesser

quote: Two great talkers will not travel far together.
name: George Borrow

quote: Airline travel is hours of boredom interrupted by moments of stark terror.
name: Al Boliska

quote: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money.
name: Lewis Hallam
